TopicTitle: Behind the Scenes of "Mission to Duna - Rescuing the Hope"

Articles.Content:
Hello, everyone! This is basically going to be a story-free version of my piece of writing called "Mission to Duna - Saving the Hope", with all the proper mission-report stuff in it. That means that the journey of the "rescue ship" in the story will be documented here as if it was a regular mission. The same pictures will be used. Here's the main story.

The Real Background of the Story

Well, the "story" of the Hope WAS intended to be an AAR on it's own. HOWEVER - when it entered Duna's SOI, the Kraken attacked it. For the sake of the story, the plot was modified and a second ship hurriedly built in orbit by me. It's waiting in orbit now actually, waiting for when I decide to start the story for real.

Updates will come every week (hopefully... exams are coming up...)!
